title: Rebellion At Macedon
opening: Leaving painful memories behind, Marth and his companions left Grust. They landed in Macedon; their new mission to rescue Princess Minerva. After the War of Shadows, Macedon was led by Minerva, who exiled the oppressive generals and attempted to reform the military. However, the influential General Rucke opposed Minerva's peace-seeking ways. He assembled the exiled officers to instigate a coup d'etat. Caught unprepared, Minerva was captured by Rucke's followers, and his rebel army seized control of Macedon. Then, they dispatched powerful dracoknights to guard the country's forested borders.

intro.speaker: Jagen
intro.line: Macedon's main force consists of pegasus knights and dracoknights... Both are fast and highly mobile units. In particular, there are the Whitewings, who fought under our banner in the last war... There aren't many in these lands who could match their terrifying speeds.

intro.speaker: Kris
intro.line: I would have loved to witness their prowess...

intro.speaker: Jagen
intro.line: Kris, while we're on the subject of speed...

intro.speaker: Jagen
intro.line: Your speed can be summed up as exemplary. Even the Whitewings would have trouble keeping up with you. As I'd expect of an Altean Royal Guard.

intro.speaker: Kris
intro.line: It is an honor to receive such praise, Sir Jagen.

intro.speaker: Jagen
intro.line: Your speed is satisfactory. But the Whitewings would simply fly straight over you.

intro.speaker: Kris
intro.line: I see... I'll be more careful, Sir Jagen.

intro.speaker: Jagen
intro.line: Your speed is, sadly, terribly lacking. The Whitewings would probably reach their destination in half your time...

intro.speaker: Kris
intro.line: I-I see... I-I'll be more careful, Sir Jagen.

intro.speaker: Anna
intro.line: Hello there Kris.

intro.speaker: Kris
intro.line: Hm? You're...? Why do I feel like we've met somewhere before...?

intro.speaker: Anna
intro.line: Oh, don't worry about little old me. The important thing is that I came here to share a wonderful tip with you. Have you heard about "How's Everyone"?

intro.speaker: Kris
intro.line: How's... everyone?

intro.speaker: Anna
intro.line: "How's Everyone" is all the rage! By checking it, you can see how everyone in your army is faring. You can watch your allies train, discover useful items, or even listen to their thoughts... So if you ever want to know how everyone is, then take a look at "How's Everyone." Easy, right?

intro.speaker: Kris
intro.line: I... see. Thanks, I guess.

intro.speaker: Anna
intro.line: The more time passes, the more things you'll be able to see. If you ever feel the urge, then go ahead and take a peek! Well, I'll be off now. Buh-bye!

intro.speaker: Catria
intro.line: Prince Marth!! Thank goodness you've come to Macedon!

intro.speaker: Marth
intro.line: Catria?! I received word that there was a rebellion in Macedon. Are you unharmed?

intro.speaker: Catria
intro.line: Yes, I'm fine. My older sister Palla and I managed to escape somehow. But Princess Minerva was captured by the rebels. Prince Marth, please... You have to rescue Princess Minerva! At this rate, her life will be in danger!

intro.speaker: Marth
intro.line: Of course I will help her. Catria, please take us to where she is.

intro.speaker: Catria
intro.line: Yes, my lord! But first we have to break through these woods. General Rumel's dragon knight squad is lurking within this area. If we approach from the front, we'll be easy pickings for them.

intro.speaker: Marth
intro.line: I see...So you're suggesting we flank them from the left or right. Thank you, Catria. Leave it to us!

visit.speaker: Villager
visit.line: Warren's a bit of an idiot. Just 'cause they paid him well, he went ahead and joined the rebel army! Ahh, to think a fool like him was once acquainted with the fair Catria...

visit.speaker: Villager
visit.line: Look out for those pilfering thieves. If they take off with your precious treasure, you won't ever get it back. Never let them escape from your sight.

visit.speaker: Villager
visit.line: Because of the last war, every nation has been forced to lead hard lives. The only well-off country is Archanea, ruled by Emperor Hardin.

visit.speaker: Villager
visit.line: Some dirty thieves took our village treasure, the Lady Sword, and ran off with it. Only women can wield the incredible power of that sword. Please, prise it back from their filthy hands.

visit.speaker: Villager
visit.line: Beware when dracoknights are around. Even from a far-off distance, they can move all at once and swoop down on you!

recruit-visit.speaker: Marth
recruit-visit.line: You're... Cord! What are you doing so far from Talys?

recruit-visit.speaker: Cord
recruit-visit.line: I couldn't sit still when I heard you's fighting again, so I came to join in. We're Talys's mercenaries, right? If ya died, Princess Caeda'd cry. Prince Marth, lemme fight too. I'll join you's army.

recruit-talk.speaker: Catria
recruit-talk.line: Warren?! Even a good man like you has sided with the rebel army...

recruit-talk.speaker: Warren
recruit-talk.line: Catria the White, huh? It's been a while. You know I'm just a common hunter. If they pay me enough, I'll do anything.

recruit-talk.speaker: Catria
recruit-talk.line: Warren, listen to me! Princess Minerva endeavored to create a country where its people could live at ease. She exiled soldiers and generals of ill repute to accomplish that goal. But General Rucke, despite knowing this, roused the soldiers into a coup d'etat. Can't you see? He's just trying to make this country into his own! And you can honestly say you're okay with that?

recruit-talk.speaker: Warren
recruit-talk.line: ...I see. Well, I don't like the military acting as if they owned the place... Alright then. If you're going to help the princess, then so will I.

recruit-battle.speaker: Warren
recruit-battle.line: No hard feelings. I don't have anything against you, but this is the way I live. Forgive me!

recruit-battle.speaker: Warren
recruit-battle.line: Damn it... I should've seen this coming...

boss.speaker: Rumel
boss.line: Taste the terror of Macedon's fearless dracoknight squad!

boss.speaker: Rumel
boss.line: General Rucke, I leave the rest to you...

end.speaker: Jagen
end.line: Sire, we found someone most unusual confined in one of the fortress rooms.

end.speaker: Marth
end.line: Hm? ...Linde! How did you wind up in a dangerous place like this?

end.speaker: Kris
end.line: Sire, do you know this woman?

end.speaker: Marth
end.line: Yes, this is Linde. Her natural talent for magic helped us a great deal in the last war.

end.speaker: Linde
end.line: Prince Marth! Thank heavens. What a pleasant surprise meeting you here. I desperately needed to see you again, so I set out to find you. But the Macedonian soldiers found me suspicious and they dragged me to this fortress...

end.speaker: Marth
end.line: Is that so? I'm glad you're safe. But, why were you looking for me? Shouldn't you be by Princess Nyna's side?

end.speaker: Linde
end.line: I was requested by Princess Nyna to deliver you this.

end.speaker: Marth
end.line: Huh? This...! This is the Fire Emblem! The royal heirlom of Archanea: the Emblem Shield!

end.speaker: Kris
end.line: The Fire Emblem... I heard that in the last war, Princess Nyna entrusted you with it, sire...

end.speaker: Marth
end.line: Indeed. I looked after this as Archanea's representative in the last war. But why give this to me now? Especially at a time when Archanea has so much influence under Emperor Hardin's reign? In this peaceful age, why is Princess Nyna giving me the "Champion's Proof"...?

end.speaker: Linde
end.line: I don't understand either. Princess Nyna didn't explain why, just that I had to give it to you... I remember her eyes seemed so sad... I think she may have been crying...

end.speaker: Marth
end.line: Princess Nyna crying?! What on earth has been happening...? Linde, after this battle ends, I will go see Princess Nyna. Until then, I want you to remain with us.
